column7: I am a local and I will not be going back.
column9: We used to eat here occasionally but will not be going back.  It is not bad but there are plenty of other pizza places in Lund which are better, have better service and a nicer atmosphere.
The food is okay but the staff was awful this time. The bottom of the pizza was burned, which was not so great, but the taste was fine. When we went in February the card reader was broken.

This has to be the second worst pizza I have ever eaten (the worst being in a Romanian railway station restaurant, using ketchup as tomato sauce and green peas as topping). Way too much cheese (after I was done I had about 200g of melt...More

Fairly good Italian style pizzas, that are pretty inexpensive. Great value. The place itself is a bit shabby and sometimes the service has been a little poor but the pizzas have always held the same good quality.

It takes long time to order food and get attention from the waiter.
When you are foreing they do not advice they are going to bill the TUBE WATER !!!!
The credit card machine did not work for 10 minutes and they do not have...More

column7: Hey, it's a pizza place, manage your expectations.
column9:
Northern Italy style pizza done pretty well.  I enjoyed the Tuna pizza.  Fairly large individual size, good portions.

Service was friendly and prompt.

column7: They try to add a "luxorious" feeling to eating a perfectly normal swedish pizza...nothing more. Plus the...
column9: They try to add a "luxorious" feeling to eating a perfectly normal swedish pizza...nothing more. Plus the order telephone keeps ringing all the time, which is disturbing. Only positive remark is that it is very conveniently located opposite the railway station.

column7: quite cheap, but unfortunately not good at all.
